title: Is the Apple Pencil 1 compatible with the new iPad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply put, no. The reasoning - factual and assumed - for this are numerous. Regardless, Apple’s new 2018 iPad Pro only works with the 2018 Apple pencil.

No you cannot. There is no way to pair the first generation pencil with the new iPad. The first generation pencil pairs using the Lightening port and the new iPad has USB C. The second generation pencil charges and pairs using the magnetic attachment on the side of the new iPad.
